description:
Despite being drawn into a difficult battle, Boruto and the others manage to force Funamushi’s squad to retreat, but it comes with a heavy price.
Meanwhile, in the seas near the Land of Water, the Hidden Mist Village ninja led by the Mizukage, Chojuro, are in a standoff with the pirates. Despite being told by his foster brother Isari to wait for an opening, Tenma becomes irritated by the battle’s slow progress. In order to meet the expectations of his foster father Araumi, he jumps into action to hasten the progress of the battle.
Source: crunchyroll
